verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these חָ֥טְא֛וּ <S%H2398><s%> had offended מַשְׁקֵ֥ה <S%H4945><s%> the cupbearer מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְהָאֹפֶ֑ה <S%H644><s%> and [his] baker לַאֲדֹנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H113><s%> their lord לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַיִּקְצֹ֣ף <S%H7107><s%> was wroth פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> against שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> two סָרִיסָ֑יו <S%H5631><s%> [of] his officers עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> and שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> against the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֔ים <S%H4945><s%> cupbearer וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> and against the chief הָאוֹפִֽים׃ <S%H644><s%> of the bakers

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> And he put אֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> בְּמִשְׁמַ֗ר <S%H4929><s%> them in ward בֵּ֛ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> of the captain הַטַבָּחִ֖ים <S%H2876><s%> of the guard אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house הַסֹּ֑הַר <S%H5470><s%> prison מְק֕וֹם <S%H4725><s%> the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> where Joseph אָס֥וּר <S%H631><s%> [was] bound שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

וַ֠יִּפְקֹד <S%H6485><s%> charged שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> And the captain הַטַּבָּחִ֧ים <S%H2876><s%> of the guard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph אִתָּ֖ם <S%H854><s%> and he וַיְשָׁ֣רֶת <S%H8334><s%> with them and he served אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> them and they continued a season בְּמִשְׁמָֽר׃ <S%H4929><s%> in ward

וַיַּֽחַלְמוּ֩ <S%H2492><s%> And they dreamed חֲל֨וֹם <S%H2472><s%> a dream שְׁנֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H8147><s%> both of them אִ֤ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another חֲלֹמוֹ֙ <S%H2472><s%> his dream בְּלַ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> night אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> in one אִ֖ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another כְּפִתְר֣וֹן <S%H6623><s%> according to the interpretation חֲלֹמ֑וֹ <S%H2472><s%> of his dream הַמַּשְׁקֶ֣ה <S%H4945><s%> the cupbearer וְהָאֹפֶ֗ה <S%H644><s%> and the baker אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who אֲסוּרִ֖ים <S%H631><s%> which [were] bound בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> court הַסֹּֽהַר׃ <S%H5470><s%> prison

וַיָּבֹ֧א <S%H935><s%> came in אֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> when יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> unto them in the morning וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> and looked אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְהִנָּ֖ם <S%H2005><s%> behold זֹעֲפִֽים׃ <S%H2196><s%> upon them and behold they [were] sad

וַיִּשְׁאַ֞ל <S%H7592><s%> And he asked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סְרִיסֵ֣י <S%H5631><s%> officers פַרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh's אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֧וֹ <S%H854><s%> in בְמִשְׁמַ֛ר <S%H4929><s%> that [were] with him in the ward בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אֲדֹנָ֖יו <S%H113><s%> of his lord's לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying מַדּ֛וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why פְּנֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H6440><s%> Wherefore look רָעִ֖ים <S%H7451><s%> ye [so] sadly הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> age

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about חֲל֣וֹם <S%H2472><s%> a dream חָלַ֔מְנוּ <S%H2492><s%> unto him We have dreamed וּפֹתֵ֖ר <S%H6622><s%> and [there is] no interpreter אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> about יוֹסֵ֗ף <S%H3130><s%> of it And Joseph הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not לֵֽאלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> angels פִּתְרֹנִ֔ים <S%H6623><s%> unto them [Do] not interpretations סַפְּרוּ־ <S%H5608><s%> commune נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> please לִֽי׃

וַיְסַפֵּ֧ר <S%H5608><s%> told שַֽׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> And the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֛ים <S%H4945><s%> cupbearer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲלֹמ֖וֹ <S%H2472><s%> his dream לְיוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> to Joseph וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֔וֹ בַּחֲלוֹמִ֕י <S%H2472><s%> to him In my dream וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold גֶ֖פֶן <S%H1612><s%> behold a vine לְפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> [was] before me

וּבַגֶּ֖פֶן <S%H1612><s%> And in the vine שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> [were] three שָׂרִיגִ֑ם <S%H8299><s%> branches וְהִ֤יא <S%H1931><s%> it was כְפֹרַ֙חַת֙ <S%H6524><s%> and it [was] as though it budded עָלְתָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> shot forth נִצָּ֔הּ <S%H5322><s%> [and] her blossoms הִבְשִׁ֥ילוּ <S%H1310><s%> thereof brought forth ripe אַשְׁכְּלֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H811><s%> and the clusters עֲנָבִֽים׃ <S%H6025><s%> grapes

וְכ֥וֹס <S%H3563><s%> cup פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh's בְּיָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> [was] in my hand וָאֶקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> and I took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽעֲנָבִ֗ים <S%H6025><s%> the grapes וָֽאֶשְׂחַ֤ט <S%H7818><s%> and pressed אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כּ֣וֹס <S%H3563><s%> cup פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> them into Pharaoh's וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and I gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכּ֖וֹס <S%H3563><s%> the cup עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> hand פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> into Pharaoh's

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> This פִּתְרֹנ֑וֹ <S%H6623><s%> unto him This [is] the interpretation שְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H7969><s%> of it The three הַשָּׂ֣רִגִ֔ים <S%H8299><s%> branches שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> [are] three יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days הֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

בְּע֣וֹד ׀ <S%H5750><s%> Yet שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> within three יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days יִשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> lift up פַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> shall Pharaoh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשֶׁ֔ךָ <S%H7218><s%> thine head וַהֲשִֽׁיבְךָ֖ <S%H7725><s%> and restore עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כַּנֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3653><s%> thee unto thy place וְנָתַתָּ֤ <S%H5414><s%> and thou shalt deliver כוֹס־ <S%H3563><s%> cup פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh's בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> into his hand כַּמִּשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> manner הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> after the former אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> when הָיִ֖יתָ <S%H1961><s%> become מַשְׁקֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4945><s%> were his cupbearer

כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo זְכַרְתַּ֣נִי <S%H2142><s%> But think אִתְּךָ֗ <S%H854><s%> for כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> it יִ֣יטַב <S%H3190><s%> on me when it shall be well לָ֔ךְ וְעָשִֽׂיתָ־ <S%H6213><s%> with thee and shew נָּ֥א <S%H4994><s%> and please עִמָּדִ֖י <S%H5978><s%> me חָ֑סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindness וְהִזְכַּרְתַּ֙נִי֙ <S%H2142><s%> I pray thee unto me and make mention אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> of me unto Pharaoh וְהוֹצֵאתַ֖נִי <S%H3318><s%> and bring me מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַבַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> out of this house הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> of this

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גֻנֹּ֣ב <S%H1589><s%> For indeed I was stolen away גֻּנַּ֔בְתִּי <S%H1589><s%> kidnapped מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land הָעִבְרִ֑ים <S%H5680><s%> of the Hebrews וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and even פֹּה֙ <S%H6311><s%> here לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not עָשִׂ֣יתִֽי <S%H6213><s%> and here also have I done מְא֔וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> nothing כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> should שָׂמ֥וּ <S%H7760><s%> that they should put אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> בַּבּֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> me into the dungeon

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> When the chief הָאֹפִ֖ים <S%H644><s%> baker כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> was good פָּתָ֑ר <S%H6622><s%> that the interpretation וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph אַף־ <S%H637><s%> I also אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I בַּחֲלוֹמִ֔י <S%H2472><s%> [was] in my dream וְהִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold שְׁלֹשָׁ֛ה <S%H7969><s%> and behold [I had] three סַלֵּ֥י <S%H5536><s%> baskets חֹרִ֖י <S%H2751><s%> white עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7218><s%> on my head

וּבַסַּ֣ל <S%H5536><s%> basket הָֽעֶלְי֔וֹן <S%H5945><s%> And in the uppermost מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> of all מַאֲכַ֥ל <S%H3978><s%> [there was] of all manner פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> for Pharaoh מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> act אֹפֶ֑ה <S%H644><s%> of baked וְהָע֗וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and the birds אֹכֵ֥ל <S%H398><s%> did eat אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַסַּ֖ל <S%H5536><s%> them out of the basket מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> upon רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7218><s%> my head

וַיַּ֤עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> This פִּתְרֹנ֑וֹ <S%H6623><s%> This [is] the interpretation שְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H7969><s%> thereof The three הַסַּלִּ֔ים <S%H5536><s%> baskets שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> [are] three יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days הֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

בְּע֣וֹד ׀ <S%H5750><s%> more שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> Yet within three יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days יִשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> lift up פַרְעֹ֤ה <S%H6547><s%> shall Pharaoh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹֽאשְׁךָ֙ <S%H7218><s%> thy head מֵֽעָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and וְתָלָ֥ה <S%H8518><s%> from off thee and shall hang אוֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on עֵ֑ץ <S%H6086><s%> thee on a tree וְאָכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> shall eat הָע֛וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and the birds אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂרְךָ֖ <S%H1320><s%> thy flesh מֵעָלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <S%H7992><s%> And it came to pass the third י֚וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הֻלֶּ֣דֶת <S%H3205><s%> bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> [which was] Pharaoh's וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> that he made מִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <S%H4960><s%> a feast לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all עֲבָדָ֑יו <S%H5650><s%> unto all his servants וַיִּשָּׂ֞א <S%H5375><s%> and he lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֣אשׁ ׀ <S%H7218><s%> the head שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> of the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֗ים <S%H4945><s%> cupbearer וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֛אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> and the head שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> and of the chief הָאֹפִ֖ים <S%H644><s%> baker בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <S%H5650><s%> his servants

וַיָּ֛שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֖ים <S%H4945><s%> unto his butlership עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto מַשְׁקֵ֑הוּ <S%H4945><s%> his office וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and he gave הַכּ֖וֹס <S%H3563><s%> the cup עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> hand פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> into Pharaoh's

וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> the chief הָאֹפִ֖ים <S%H644><s%> baker תָּלָ֑ה <S%H8518><s%> But he hanged כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after פָּתַ֛ר <S%H6622><s%> had interpreted לָהֶ֖ם יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> as Joseph

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not זָכַ֧ר <S%H2142><s%> remember שַֽׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> Yet did not the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֛ים <S%H4945><s%> cupbearer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph וַיִּשְׁכָּחֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7911><s%> but forgat פ
